thread.title: Man with learning difficulties sexually assaulted in Bromley shopping centre toilets
thread.title_full: Man with learning difficulties sexually assaulted in Bromley shopping centre toilets - Telegraph

author: Danny Boyle
title: Man with learning difficulties sexually assaulted in Bromley shopping centre toilets
text: A young man with learning difficulties has been sexually assaulted in the toilets of a shopping centre in south-east London. The 25-year-old was targeted at the intu shopping centre, in Bromley town centre, in an attack in the middle of the afternoon. Metropolitan Police detectives are now seeking a man, aged between 60 and 70, in connection with the incident. CCTV image of a man police are seeking in connection with a sexual in the toilets of intu shopping centre, Bromley (Metropolitan Police) The assault happened in the ground-floor toilets of the shopping centre, between Boots and the Time 4 Pets store. Police were called after the incident, between 12.45pm and 2pm on Thursday, September 10. The suspect is described as black and was using a walking stick. He was wearing a navy three-quarter length casual jacket, a white shirt, brown shoes and a navy fisherman's hat. The attack happened at the intu shopping centre in Bromley Photo: ALAMY Officers from Bromley CID are investigating and appealed for anyone with information or who recognises the man pictured in the CCTV to come forward. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraphnews
